text:
Cache is not created/updated if only one file has changed.
I'll attach small test script later.

text:
Created attachment 20432
testcase

steps to reproduce:
1. execute default target in script

expected result: cache file "aa.properties" is created

actual result: cache file is not created

Looks like a small misprint in

Nice catch.
I have applied the changes and the unit test to ANT head and ANT_17_BRANCH.
Thanks for the contribution.
